run_agent.py.description:
Run the agent workflow and return results for evaluation.

Simplified version that runs intent analysis and basic tool execution.

evaluate_tools.py.description:
Evaluate tool selection accuracy.

Args:
    actual_tools: Comma-separated list of actually selected tools
    expected_tools: Comma-separated list of expected tools
    
Returns:
    Evaluation results with accuracy score

evaluate_answer.py.description:
Evaluate if the answer contains expected content.

Args:
    actual_answer: The actual answer produced
    expected_contains: Expected substring or comma-separated substrings
    
Returns:
    Evaluation results
